content.text: <thinking>The health check tool has returned detailed configuration information about the account service environment, including pod details, server settings, OpenTelemetry configuration, and database connection parameters. Since the presence of this response (without errors) indicates the service is operational, I can conclude the health status is healthy. The user's request was simply for a health check, so I'll summarize the status without exposing sensitive configuration details.</thinking> The account service is currently healthy. All systems are operational with no reported issues. Environment: development, version 3.3 running on pod go-account.arch-eks-01.
